forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny, with a high near 61. Southwest wind 5 to 10 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 50. West southwest wind 5 to 9 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn breaks over Downtown San Francisco, the air feels crisp and invigorating, perfectly embodying the charm of a spring morning. With the day unfolding, a pleasant mix of sunshine and scattered clouds plays across the sky, offering glimpses of blue that invite wanderers to explore the city’s vibrant streets. The gentle winds from the southwest enhance the scene, adding a refreshing note to the mild temperatures. 

As the sun climbs higher, the promise of a high near 61 degrees lingers in the air, beckoning those with a penchant for the outdoors to engage in leisurely pursuits. While the coastal fog typically blankets parts of the Bay, today’s marine layer retreats to reveal iconic landmarks—the Golden Gate Bridge standing gracefully in the distance, a testament to the city’s allure. With evening approaching, the forecast hints at a cool low around 50, encouraging layers for comfort as twilight settles in. Yet, for now, the day radiates a sense of possibility, ideal for a wander through the historic streets or coffee at a sidewalk café. A light jacket or cardigan will serve well, blending practicality with style as you take in the beauty of this enchanting urban landscape.
